languages.text: Свист этого клинка поет о смерти нечестивцев, что прогневали Неумирающего и искупят свой грех мучениями.

traits.locale_text: Свист этого клинка поет о смерти нечестивцев, что прогневали Неумирающего и искупят свой грех мучениями.

languages.text: The whistling of this blade laments the deaths of the wicked who have angered the Undying One and so will atone for their deeds with torment.
languages.original_text: Свист этого клинка поет о смерти нечестивцев, что прогневали Неумирающего и искупят свой грех мучениями.

traits.locale_text: The whistling of this blade laments the deaths of the wicked who have angered the Undying One and will atone for their sin with torment.

The whistling of this blade laments the deaths of the wicked who have angered the Undying One and so will atone for their deeds with torment.
The whistling of this blade laments the deaths of the wicked who have angered the Undying One and so will atone for their deeds with torment.

languages.text: Das Pfeifen dieser Klinge betrauert den Tod der Bösen, welche den Todlosen erzürnt haben und daher durch Pein für ihre Taten büßen müssen.
languages.original_text: The whistling of this blade laments the deaths of the wicked who have angered the Undying One and so will atone for their deeds with torment.

traits.locale_text: Das Pfeifen dieser Klinge betrauert den Tod der Bösen, welche den Todlosen erzürnt haben und daher durch Pein für ihre Taten büßen müssen.

languages.text: El silbido de su filo lamenta las muertes de los malvados que enfurecen al Inmortal y, por tanto, deben pagar por sus actos con el tormento.
languages.original_text: The whistling of this blade laments the deaths of the wicked who have angered the Undying One and so will atone for their deeds with torment.

traits.locale_text: El silbido de su filo lamenta las muertes de los malvados que enfurecen al Inmortal y, por tanto, deben pagar por sus actos con el tormento.

languages.text: この刃の口笛は、不死の者を怒らせた邪悪な者の死を嘆き、苦悩でもってその行いを償わせる。
languages.original_text: The whistling of this blade laments the deaths of the wicked who have angered the Undying One and so will atone for their deeds with torment.

traits.locale_text: この刃の口笛は、不死の者を怒らせた邪悪な者の死を嘆き、苦悩でもってその行いを償わせる。

languages.text: 这把利刃的呼啸声宛如挽歌一般，呼唤着那些亵渎不死之神的恶人的名字，他们将以痛苦来赎罪。
languages.original_text: The whistling of this blade laments the deaths of the wicked who have angered the Undying One and so will atone for their deeds with torment.

traits.locale_text: 这把利刃的呼啸声宛如挽歌一般，呼唤着那些亵渎不死之神的恶人的名字，他们将以痛苦来赎罪。

languages.text: Le sifflement de cette lame annonce la mort de ceux qui ont provoqué la colère de l'Immortel et qui expieront leurs fautes en subissant les pires tourments.
languages.original_text: The whistling of this blade laments the deaths of the wicked who have angered the Undying One and so will atone for their deeds with torment.

traits.locale_text: Le sifflement de cette lame annonce la mort de ceux qui ont provoqué la colère de l'Immortel et qui expieront leurs fautes en subissant les pires tourments.

languages.text: Bu kılıcın ıslığı, Ölmeyen'i öfkelendiren günahkârların nihayete ermiş hayatlarının matemini tutar. Bundandır ki günahkârların eylemlerinin kefaretini eziyetle öder.
languages.original_text: The whistling of this blade laments the deaths of the wicked who have angered the Undying One and so will atone for their deeds with torment.
